function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overlap of circles leading to potential disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to close proximity of individuals within enclosed spaces","Mitigation":"Implement measures to ensure physical distancing and non-overlapping of individuals in enclosed spaces","Technologies":"Space optimization algorithms, real-time occupancy monitoring, automated space rearrangement systems","People":"Occupants of enclosed spaces, facility managers, building owners","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, technology providers"},{"Description":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation","Impact":"Poor air circulation leading to potential accumulation of airborne contaminants and infectious particles","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, monitor and optimize airflow patterns, ensure regular maintenance of HVAC systems","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, HVAC automation systems, ventilation simulation software","People":"Occupants of enclosed spaces, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, building maintenance staff, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Lack of accessibility for movement and flow of people","Impact":"Restricted movement and congestion leading to higher likelihood of close contact and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Design and optimize spaces for efficient movement, ensure clear pathways and exits, implement crowd management strategies","Technologies":"Space utilization analytics, people flow monitoring systems, crowd management technologies","People":"Occupants of enclosed spaces, facility managers, event organizers","Owner":"Facility managers, event organizers, space designers"}]}
